text: Masquerade () is a 1941 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergey Gerasimov.Маскарад (1941)Россияне в жюри Каннского кинофестиваля. Справка The movie is based on the eponymous play by Mikhail Lermontov. It stars Nikolay Mordvinov, Tamara Makarova, and Mikhail Sadovsky. == Actors == * Nikolay Mordvinov - Arbenin * Tamara Makarova - Nina * Mikhail Sadovsky - Knyaz Zvezdich * Sofiya Magarill - Baroness Shtral == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1941 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Sergei Gerasimov
title: Masquerade (1941 movie)
